lead_paragraph: The return of Chicken Fries was a success for Burger King. Its parent, Restaurant Brands International, said on Monday that sales rose 7.9 percent at Burger King sites in the United States and Canada.

headline.main: Restaurant Brands’ Profit Declines, but Revenue Rises
headline.print_headline: Restaurant Brands’ Profit Declines, but Revenue Rises
